location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 4/44 Travelling Allowance Bills of the Residency Agent, Sharjah.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are filed in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 52; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains travelling allowance bills for the Residency Agent, Sharjah (Khan Bahadur Saiyid Abdur Razzaq [Sayyid ‘Abd al-Razzāq]), for the period February 1943 to February 1945 inclusive, with accompanying covering letters from the Residency Agent, Sharjah, and the Political Officer, Trucial Coast; sanction orders for travel issued by the Secretary to the Political Agent in the Persian Gulf; and invoices issued by British Overseas Airways Corporation (BOAC).
